name: Roast Beef and Horseradish Sandwich
instructions: Spread butter on one side of each slice of whole grain bread.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and place two slices of bread butter-side down in the skillet.
Layer the roast beef evenly over both slices of bread in the skillet.
Spread horseradish sauce over the top of the roast beef.
Add sliced tomato and arugula on top of the roast beef.
Place the remaining two slices of bread on top, butter-side up.
Grill the sandwiches until the bread is golden brown and the roast beef is heated through, about 3-4 minutes per side.
Remove from skillet, cut the sandwiches in half, and serve immediately.
description: A hearty and flavorful roast beef sandwich with a zesty kick of horseradish sauce, complemented by fresh tomato slices and peppery arugula. Perfect for lunch or a filling snack.
additional_notes: For a more intense flavor, you can add caramelized onions or a slice of cheese. Serve with a side salad or vegetable sticks for a complete meal.
